synthesis_conditions.method_details: Ag2C2 was added to 1 mL of a concentrated aqueous solution of AgCF3SO3 and AgBF4 (molar ratio âˆ¼1:1) with stirring until saturated. Excess Ag2C2 was filtered off, and a few drops of MeCN were added to the filtrate. The solution was placed in a desiccator charged with P2O5.
synthesis_conditions.notes: The product is light-sensitive and decomposes readily in common solvents such as water, ethanol, and acetonitrile.

chemicals_used.name: C2H5CN
chemicals_used.amount: not specified, used instead of CH3CN

synthesis_conditions.method_details: Prepared in a manner similar to that for 1 using C2H5CN instead of CH3CN.
